mutate_columns_to_posixct

Source: R/devtools.R
mutate_columns_to_posixct.Rd

Mutates column data types to POSIXct. Especially useful when working with in-memory tables where dates are often converted to int.

Usage

mutate_columns_to_posixct(data, column_names)

Arguments

data

- a dataframe to mutate

column_names

- a vector of column names to mutate

Value

The input dataframe with revised data types

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
time_columns <- c("created", "updated")
mutate_columns_to_posixct(data, time_columns)
} # }

On this page
